description: This file defines a Lightning.js component called 'Home' with its template, state, lifecycle hooks, and methods. It imports external components and manages UI transitions, animations, and component state.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the home page with animated logo, loader, and greeting text.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to cycle through predefined colors for the loader component, changing the color at specified intervals.
